comment: /**  * Resolves the given language.  *  * @param name    the name of the language  * @param context the camel context  * @return the resolved language  * @throws NoSuchLanguageException is thrown if language could not be resolved  */
code: /**  * Resolves the given language.  *  * @param name    the name of the language  * @param context the camel context  * @return the resolved language  * @throws NoSuchLanguageException is thrown if language could not be resolved  */ Language resolveLanguage(String name, CamelContext context) throws NoSuchLanguageException.
